price: «Biz, şüphesiz, bu memleket halkının üzerine, yoldan çıkmalarına karşılık gökten (feci) bir azap indireceğiz.»
arabic: إِنَّا مُنزِلُونَ عَلَىٰٓ أَهۡلِ هَٰذِهِ ٱلۡقَرۡيَةِ رِجۡزٗا مِّنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ بِمَا كَانُواْ يَفۡسُقُونَ

version.title: Turkish Translation - Ali Ozek
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by a group of scholars. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: innā munzilūna ʿalā ahli hādhihi al-qaryati rij'zan mina al-samāi bimā kānū yafsuqūna
